snippet.title: B.C. BILL (C64)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents B.C. Bill (un-emulated) for the C64, a true classic from the golden era of c64 gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1984

Loved the spectrum version of this, I played it endlessly back in the day so I was interested in seeing what the C64 version was like.
You are Bill and you must bonk a few women on the head and bonk them again in another way (lol), raise some kids, keep them fed by bonking the various animals roaming around the screen with your club and take to the cave, if you don't feed them they will leave the cave too young and die, keep them well fed and they will leve grown up happy little Bills :-)
It's a good game but the speccy version was the king for me, it was far more playable and amusing and unlike the c64 version you didn't have to cook the meat after killing it which does slow the gameplay down a little.
None the less a very nice game!

Hope all you C64 fans enjoy this upload.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the c64 and it's cool games alive!!!
